website_summaries.verdict: Functions as a laptop and tablet, providing versatility for students with digital demands.
pros: Features Windows 10, which is great for students who complete work online
Superior software for those scanning textbooks to writing papers with familiar technology
Attractive in design and functionality, and easy to carry from class to class
cons: The keyboard may feel sticky at times

customer_reviews.title: Extremely slow
customer_reviews.text: After about a year of ownership all I can say is that I regret every purchasing this machine. It has slowed down to the point where it is barely usable. Login time takes 2min+, then to get to the browser it will take another 2 minutes and even from there it is extremely unresponsive. I would not recommend this to anyone as it pretty much stopped working at about 6 months Even basic tasks such as navigating file explorer are agonizingly slow. Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Stephan

customer_reviews.title: It has give a very good performance. I'm a engineer and use this laptop ...
customer_reviews.text: Bough it in November, it has give a very good performance. I'm a engineer and use this laptop to design with AutoCad and Photoshop programs, which are very heavy to run, and so far this laptop has work as expected. After using the equipment for 5 months the mouse pad Has started to malfunction The situation really bothers me for obvious reasons. Without an external mouse the laptop is useless After a few calls to customer DELL service and 1hr downloading updates the mouse pad is back in business, for that I'll return a Star.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Martinez de Andino

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Started it up when i received in March and all good. Lying in the cupboard since then. Took it out this week and started copying data over. This morning on trying to switch it on the laptop is dead and nothing comes on. Feedback from supplier, is only 30 days warranty and they just dont care. So my recommendations is do not buy. Took it in to service centre and the motherboard has packed up. So ive had it on for 3 days. So I definately received a faulty laptop and supplier not willing to do anything about. Also not original DELL power supply
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE!!
customer_reviews.text: TERRIBLE!!! I have never written a review on here before. I feel compelled to do so with ya product. I bought this and within a month it stopped working. From the beginning it was super slow. The battery stopped charging even though it says “excellent” for battery life and says “ plugged in but not charging.” I cannot retrieve files I saved on here and the laptop has stopped responding. It will not start or just shuts down. I am awaiting a resolution from Amazon as I bought it through PRIME. I regret buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Dhaval Parikh

customer_reviews.title: ... been almost 2 months with it and it's working fine so far
customer_reviews.text: It's been almost 2 months with it and it's working fine so far........It's a very fast computer, the fastest I've had.....It takes less than a minute to boot....I almost don't use the touch screen and don't flip it, 'cause is easier for me, but those features are working great too......I'm very pleased with this purchase so far!!
customer_reviews.author: TNTFM

customer_reviews.title: Will crash and you won't have a clue why.
customer_reviews.text: I got this laptop as a gift for my sister for her birthday. In one year this laptop while using showed an update of windows 10 and crashed. Hasn't opened still. Since my sister is in Pakistan and this product doesn't come with an international warranty I'm still confused what to do with this box lying in the house. Terrible costumer service. Would never buy dell again. Puts a black stain on Amazons service when buying electronic products.
customer_reviews.author: abdul wasay khan

customer_reviews.title: Dell never anymore.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the computer a year ago. It worked for a year, then, out of the blue, the computer just doesn’t turn on anymore. I have no clue what happened. Worse than this: the warranty doesn’t cover because the retailer had the computer months before. I searched about the problem and I saw that many people have the same issue with the computer. So, I regret to have acquired a dell. It was the first and last time.
customer_reviews.author: Melina

customer_reviews.title: The computer freezes constantly
customer_reviews.text: This is the first review I'm writing because I'm not quite sure how to contact the seller. I bought this computer to be able to carry it to school every day, however the computer is constantly freezing and I'm only able to use it to go on the internet if I'm feeling lucky with it. I strongly regret buying it and would not recommend it to anyone. When I installed microsoft word on it, the computer freaked out for two days and I had to wait that long for it to finally unfreeze so I could uninstall it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: it's lightweight and a nice clear screen that can fold back to function as ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for college bound student, while not a high performance laptop by any means, it's lightweight and a nice clear screen that can fold back to function as a tablet although the 2 in 1 isn't as accessible as in dedicated tablet, it's a nice feature. Overall nice laptop especially if you find one on sale.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Computer simply does not work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and traveled all the way to Africa with it. Now I find out that the delay on all operations is more than 2 minutes. Imagine typing a sentence and waiting 2 minutes for it to appear. Opening an application, such as outlook, takes 5-10 minutes. The operating system simply fails to perform. Now it is too late for me to return this item. I lost 500 USD for no good reason.
customer_reviews.author: Angry & Disappointed Customer

customer_reviews.title: my Dell is only good for that
customer_reviews.text: Runs slow. I bought it to counter my Mac Pro not being compatible with a lot of my documents and printing; my Dell is only good for that. I've had my Mac Pro for going on 6 years and it is still faster than this Dell. I am some what disappointed. I would have bought a less expensive model than this one if I had known.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: and pretty good size
customer_reviews.text: Slick design, light, powerful, and pretty good size. I thought the 15.6" would be bigger and bulky than 13" but so far I like it. Processor is fast and graphics are pure HD. Bench tests must follow...
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: The construction seems solid and it opens and folds easily and well
customer_reviews.text: To date this machine is doing exactly what was expected. It starts up quickly and handles the tasks asked of it. The construction seems solid and it opens and folds easily and well. Pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Greg P

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: I hardly use this laptop. ..not even 50 hours in six months it keeps on freezing and finally did not find a bootable device...500 dls worth of trash ughhhhh...not ever going to buy a laptop from amazon...I have always bought from Dell
customer_reviews.author: Nica

customer_reviews.title: Power Button Stopped Working After a Few Days
customer_reviews.text: We bought this computer new. After turning it on about 10 times, the power button stopped working and we could not turn the computer on. I then spent an hour on the phone with Dell support in order to send it in for repairs, which will take 10 business days. Based on the product and the service, I would not buy any Dell product again.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Carver

customer_reviews.title: This laptop only worked for 3 months properly, after ...
customer_reviews.text: This laptop only worked for 3 months properly, after the 3 months the battery no longer holds any charge, it has to be constantly be connected to the charger. and the battery is built into the laptop so you can't, swap it out. Added to this the pc moves vey slow. I bought this as a gift for someone, and it was not functional at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kurtis

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I owned this laptop for one year and had to replace the charger. One more year, I replaced again. Now, just over 2 years, it will not work, again. $900 for original computer plus 100s for replacement chargers for 24 months. Not a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Caratach

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a review of the actual computer. The purchasing experience was 5 stars. The computer is a little laggy, and I can't really get Cortana to work but besides that, this computer is great.
customer_reviews.author: kiki

customer_reviews.title: Dont Do It Bro
customer_reviews.text: this laptop didn't even last year before it completely died on me. The computer randomly shut off on me and wont turn back on dont buy this crap bro
customer_reviews.author: chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Slow, weak, stuck, waste of money!!!
customer_reviews.text: A terrible computer. Extremely slow. Getting stuck all the time. Can't handle any load of work. No ssd drive. Won't charge battery. No hdmi connection. I trusted the Dell brand but that was a huge mistake. Don't buy it unless you like frustration.
customer_reviews.author: "libertyview"

customer_reviews.title: Dell not working
customer_reviews.text: There was a hardware problem with the PC. It went to Dell repair shop. They fixed the hardware but uninstalled my Windows 10 software. I've never been able to reinstall the software. I want to return the computer. My availability for returns expired on March 18, 2019. Can I do a return anyway? I'm a longtime customer. Thanks, Bob, Houston, TX. Pardon my using this box for returns, but y'all make it hard to find return help.
customer_reviews.author: High Life

customer_reviews.title: Terrible computer
customer_reviews.text: It is a terrible computer! I bought it for very little use, for a project at work and it can’t keep up with simple stuff. It takes forever to load, looks like it needs to update and restart every other day and sometimes it will not start at all...
customer_reviews.author: Juan Lovi

customer_reviews.title: Battery makes the product not worth purchasing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop less than a year ago and it can't even last an entire class period. What is the point of a laptop if I constantly need to be plugged in? It is also very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Bit Lock Recovery Key?
customer_reviews.text: A year later and bit recovery? We're completely locked out of the computer. HELP!
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop for size & price.
customer_reviews.text: My 76 yo Mom bought this to use with her side business of translating on line. So far it performs as we expected.
customer_reviews.author: NXL

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: This computer is very slow... takes long time to initiate and to download things
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The computers works nice but the updates of windows 10 area annoying
customer_reviews.author: Pedro M.

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished...not new! WiFi issues within a year!
customer_reviews.text: This is a refurbished product. It’s been less than one year and now Dell support tells me they cannot fix the WiFi connection issue without a full system restore because of a faulty piece.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Gel

customer_reviews.title: So far its good, I feel that its light weight and good ...
customer_reviews.text: So far its good, I feel that its light weight and good battery back up, the touch is good everything fine But, the keyboard is dis-pointed me as its small are, and there is no separate Number key and the mouse pad has only Left and right clicks
customer_reviews.author: venkata

customer_reviews.title: Unremarkable, but a solid laptop for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop for email and surfing the net. So far its been sturdy and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Art Mongillo

customer_reviews.title: Freezes
customer_reviews.text: Every since I got this laptop it constantly freezes to the point it is unusable. Can not even get it serviced according to dell the window was from December 2017 to March 2019. I got the laptop Aug 2019.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I have had more issues with this keyboard and the cursor moving around without me moving it, it’s very frustrating. The computer also seems pretty slow for and i7
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Better inside than outside
customer_reviews.text: Its very fast and overall works very well, but it is not well built. When you work on an irregular surface, the mouse starts acting by itself, clicking when its not supposed to do it. Also the total size its way larger than the screen, making it very hard to store.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Lascurain

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice laptop, works very quick and the HD resolution is perfect
customer_reviews.author: soledad cordoba

customer_reviews.title: Sent it back and was told that all hardware was good must be a software issue and was charged $65 ...
customer_reviews.text: Had computer less than 30 days and it locks up stating needs repair. Sent it back and was told that all hardware was good must be a software issue and was charged $65 to reload windows 10 or they send me my broken computer back. Paid the $65. Received computer back and takes over 5 minutes to start up. Can not load any software. You hit a key and wait 3 to 4 minutes for it to do something. Basically I am out over $500 and back where I started with a worthless computer. Since I sent it in for service 1 time there is no way to initiate another service request.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S.

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest price for what it does
customer_reviews.text: Not the greatest price for what it does, freezes a lot and windows 10 has a hard time downloading on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get Something Else
customer_reviews.text: I got this computer for my daughter starting her Masters Degree. It worked OK for several months, then it totally crashed. We had to replace the hard drive, luckily (we thought at the time) we were able to get it repaired just before she left for a summer internship overseas. Two weeks later while in Bangladesh it happened again. For this to happen again so quickly shows that something major is faulty, and the fact that she is out of the country and having to deal with this shortly after arriving in an unfamiliar country exponentially increases the problem. I would NOT recommend this computer!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: WORKS PERFECTLY!
customer_reviews.text: VERY HAPPY WITH MY PURCHASE. IT IS THE PERFECT SIZE FOR ME AND HAVE NO PROBLEMS. QUICK TOO!
customer_reviews.author: Roe

customer_reviews.title: Line on screen
customer_reviews.text: Just after a month of use, a line started showing on the screen all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Ravi B.

customer_reviews.title: It works well. BUT it has had some issues ...
customer_reviews.text: It works well. BUT it has had some issues where it has to be powered up with a Hard Start.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop at a great price! But have some patience sorting out the software and drivers first!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the purchase ... eventually, after having to run tons of updates (both Windows and Dell) and having to do a few manual fixes and uninstall some programs (including some of the Dell services!) to sort out excessive CPU usage that made the laptop super slow. Very frustrating first couple of days. However, loving it now! Is a great laptop for the price. And enjoying the touch screen as well - not having problems as some of the other reviews mentioned
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: Too slow
customer_reviews.text: The computer was extremely slow. It would not be helpful for me to use this computer at all. Returning!
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Not as cheap as some but I consider it an excellent purchase. Battery life is good and lasts a ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter & she loves it. Runs well for an I3 machine. She likes the touch screen & bright keyboard. Just the right size, light & convenient . Appears well made & not flimsy. A solid machine. Not as cheap as some but I consider it an excellent purchase. Battery life is good and lasts a long time. Don't really have any thing negative to say about it. I've purchased many computers over the years & built systems my self at times. The screen color & brightness is also very good. It was a very good choice to take to school every day.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a little slow to start and it takes more than 30 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia Quintero

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Teeeible as I remember Dell to be. If I could give zero stars I would. This is 2 months old and I missed the return window by one month. It is JUNK...freezes up all the time, slow to start and closes windows on its own. Doesn’t have any additional programs installed except the anti-virus. We installed that to ensure it wasn’t a virus slowing the computer down. I would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: djcinflorida

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: Got it on time at a good price and amazon as usual was awesome. But for some reason this laptop was as slow as a tortoise even for opening browser etc. may be I got a faulty peice but I did not want to take a risk hence returned
customer_reviews.author: Saurabh

customer_reviews.title: ... adapter was delivered with a contact problem which got worse till it eventually stopped working in less than 2 .
customer_reviews.text: The laptop adapter was delivered with a contact problem which got worse till it eventually stopped working in less than 2 months after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She was very happy and she liked the color so we tried to ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop (Dell Inspiron 5000 i3) as a Christmas for my mom. She was very happy and she liked the color so we tried to set it up so she can use it. The thing is that this laptop is super slow in booting and shutting down! It’s also slow when navigating and the opening desktop wallpaper says Lenovo! I’m very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Shintaru Lance

customer_reviews.title: Good Laptop
customer_reviews.text: I got mine yesterday ,, so far ,, the laptop looks pretty good ,,,, system runs great,,, not much lagging ,,,, i think its because the 16gb ram and 512 SSD, but one thing i don't really like it ,,, its the fan noise ..........after i open Photoshop processing my work , fans kicked on ,,,,,,it's really loud everything else was perfect

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing laptop with all the features that one would need. Super fast machine with touch screen. A must buy.

customer_reviews.title: I have had this for a couple of months now ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a couple of months now, and very impressed with the speed and screen resolution. This computer meets my needs.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Fast and great screen. Only downside is the lack of number pad keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Steve841

customer_reviews.title: Hard drive failure
customer_reviews.text: Have had the computer about seven months. In that time I have had to reinstall windows twice due to a hard drive malfunction. I expected to get at least 12 months of use out of this computer without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Brownsville

customer_reviews.title: Dell, buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I got new, it was nice but would not download windows 10 update, called Dell and they wanted money to fix the software problem that was on it when I bought it. Two days after getting it it is on the way back to amazon. Dell sucks, never again

customer_reviews.title: Fast laptop!
customer_reviews.text: Nice laptop, very fast with the i7 and SSD. Only thing I would have liked is the Pro version of Windows - it came with the Home version of Windows.

customer_reviews.title: No light up keyboard!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this the other day and it does not have a light up keyboard!
customer_reviews.author: Skylar

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop.
customer_reviews.text: Good laptop. Looks good. Way faster than my last one. It doesn't have a graphics card, but for a student/professional who isn't into gaming, it's a great buy. Comparable to using windows on the latest mac , with a solid feel. I usually use my laptop for programming etc, and I'm very pleased so far. Decent sound system.
customer_reviews.author: Shailav Taneja

customer_reviews.title: ... body is the minus points rest of things are good.
customer_reviews.text: Mouse is not working properly and fabric body is the minus points rest of things are good.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible computer
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this computer only February 2018. My college son must have opened a site and immediately a pop up came up and he called the 1-800 number and sure enough the computer became effective. BEWARE! When I googled the number it was a scam! The computer became effective with a virus. Now we have to erase the whole computer. We are apple users but I was being cheap and bought the Dell but NEVER again. So, we ended up buying the Mac Pro Air computer. I'm sure we will have better luck!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Laptop. Powerful and solid so far
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Laptop. Powerful and solid so far. It got right on time as expected. Awesome performance for a good price. And this is not a high school working laptop like someone commented. Is a 7th generation processor, 16 GB ram and 512 SSD... not a toy... :)

customer_reviews.title: Very fast HDD.
customer_reviews.text: Very light for its specifications, and the HDD is surprisingly fast for a non SSD.

customer_reviews.title: nice display, big screen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, working like a breeze after initial drivers ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, working like a breeze after initial drivers and windows update. The 4GB RAM is slightly inadequate, i've upgraded it to 8 GB. Very Satisfied.

customer_reviews.title: This two in one lap in my opinion is everything ...
customer_reviews.text: This two in one lap in my opinion is everything you need for a home computer, and when you need to go away for a week or a couple of months just put it in is travel bag and go no need to come home to three thousand e-mails or worry about your checks being deposed. I originally had a tower with a twenty inch monitor lasted fifteen years however there's no putting it in a travel bag and leaving, I even use it in the motel when we stop for the night...Richard

customer_reviews.text: My son uses this laptop for music production and it has worked very well.

product_meta.title: Dell Inspiron 15 2-in-1 Laptop Intel Core i3 (up to 2.40 GHz), 4GB Ram, 500GB HDD, 15.6" Screen, Gray (i5578-3093GRY-PUS)
product_meta.description: With an innovative 360-degree hinge, the Inspiron 5000 series 2-in-1 laptop allows you to switch between four different modes: tent mode for using recipes in real time, stand mode for movies on the airplane, laptop mode for typing your novel or emailing work, and the tablet mode makes reading while you're reclined easier than ever. Inspiron 15 5000 Series: 15.6-inch FHD IPS Truelife LED-Backlit Touch Display with Wide Viewing Angles-HD Camera, 7th Generation Intel Core i3-7100U Processor, 4GB, 2400MHz DDR4 , 500GB 5400RPM, Intel HD Graphics 620, Bluetooth 4.2, 3-Cell, 1 x HDMI, 2 x USB 3.0, 1 x USB 2.0, 2 x USB 3.0, 1 x USB 2.0, 1 x combo headphone / microphone Jack, 3 in 1 Card Reader, Height 0.80" X Width: 14.99" X Depth: 9.96", Starting 4.54lbs, Non Backlit Keyboard, English, Integrated Widescreen HD 720P Webcam with Dual Digital Microphone Array, Windows 10 Home English, Stereo speakers, 45W AC Adapter.
feature_bullets: 7th Generation Intel Core i3-7100U Processor (3M Cache, up to 2.40 GHz)
500GB 5400RPM SATA Hard Drive , No Optical Drive
15.6-inch FHD (1920 x 1080) IPS True-life LED-Backlit Touch Display with Wide Viewing Angles-HD Camera

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars10 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
